name: Chatbot Immobilier avec Correspondance de Propriétés AI et Planification Automatisée de Calendrier
description:
# Description
Un système d'automatisation de chatbot immobilier complet qui gère les demandes des clients, les recherches de propriétés et la planification de rendez-vous grâce à des flux de conversation intelligents et au traitement des e-mails.

## Comment ça fonctionne ?
Ce modèle crée un système d'automatisation immobilier de bout en bout qui gère les demandes des clients depuis le premier contact jusqu'à la réservation de rendez-vous.

### 1. Point d'Entrée Client
- Le webhook reçoit les messages des clients depuis l'interface de chat
- La détection de lien vérifie si le client a partagé des URL de propriétés
- Routage intelligent - si un lien de propriété est trouvé, récupère les détails immédiatement ; sinon, continue la conversation

### 2. Traitement de Contenu AI
- Filtre de contenu (PRIORITÉ) - bloque les requêtes non immobilières dès le départ
- Extraction d'informations - scanne les messages à la recherche de détails personnels et de besoins en propriété
- Détection de transfert humain - identifie les demandes d'assistance d'agent en direct

### 3. Phase de Collecte de Données
- Collecte séquentielle : Informations personnelles (nom → téléphone → e-mail) puis besoins en propriété
- Validation intelligente - format de téléphone, structure d'e-mail, analyse de budget
- Pas de redondance - ne demande jamais d'informations déjà fournies
- Stockage PostgreSQL - enregistre les données des clients et la mémoire de conversation

### 4. Recherche et Correspondance de Propriétés
- Requête de base de données filtre les propriétés par type, emplacement, budget, disponibilité
- Amélioration d'image - récupère les photos de propriété depuis le stockage média
- Classement des résultats - retourne les 5 meilleures correspondances triées par prix

### 5. Génération de Réponses AI
- Formatage GPT-4 crée des annonces de propriétés engageantes et professionnelles
- Amélioration visuelle - inclut des images de propriété et des détails clés
- Ton personnalisé - reconnaît les préférences du client

### 6. Automatisation des Rendez-vous
- Surveillance Gmail - vérifie les confirmations de rendez-vous chaque heure
- Intégration de calendrier - crée, met à jour, supprime des rendez-vous automatiquement
- Planification intelligente - vérifie la disponibilité, suggère des alternatives en cas de conflits
- Réponses par e-mail - envoie des confirmations et des suivis

### Fonctionnalités d'Intelligence
##### Conscience du Contexte
- Se souvient de l'historique de conversation à travers les sessions
Construit progressivement un profil client complet
Maintient les préférences de propriété tout au long de l'interaction
##### Extraction Intelligente
- Reconnaît les types de propriétés : HDB, Condo, Appartement
- Analyse automatiquement les emplacements et les préférences MRT
Gère divers formats de budget (SGD 2,500, $2500, etc.)
Identifie les exigences de calendrier et le statut de citoyenneté

### Transferts Professionnels
- Détecte les demandes d'agent humain avec correspondance de mots-clés
- Collecte le contexte client complet avant le transfert
- Envoie des e-mails de transfert structurés avec toutes les exigences
- Assure une transition fluide vers les agents en direct

### Composants Techniques
##### Modèles AI
- OpenAI GPT-4 - Gestion principale de la conversation et formatage des réponses
- GPT-4 Mini - Traitement des rendez-vous et gestion des e-mails
- Mémoire LangChain - Rétention du contexte de conversation

### Intégration de Base de Données
- PostgreSQL - Données clients, annonces de propriétés, historique de conversation
- Recherche de propriétés avec filtrage multi-critères
Intégration de stockage média pour les images de propriété

### Canaux de Communication
- API Webhook - Interface de chat principale
- Intégration Gmail - Confirmations de rendez-vous et notifications
- Google Calendar - Planification automatisée et vérification de disponibilité

### Exigences de Configuration
- Configurer la base de données - PostgreSQL avec tables de propriétés et de clients
- Configurer les intégrations - Gmail, Google Calendar, API OpenAI
- Personnaliser les invites - Ajuster les réponses AI pour votre marque
- Tester le flux de travail - Vérifier la fonctionnalité de bout en bout
- Surveiller les performances - Suivre les taux de réussite des conversations
- Le système est conçu pour gérer l'ensemble du parcours client, de la demande initiale à la visite de propriété programmée, avec une automatisation intelligente réduisant le travail manuel tout en maintenant une haute qualité de service.

options.systemMessage:
=You are a real estate assistant named PropPanda. You MUST follow this EXACT step-by-step workflow with intelligent information extraction:

## CONTENT FILTER (FIRST PRIORITY)

IMMEDIATE CHECK: Before any other processing, check if the user's message is related to real estate services:

ALLOWED TOPICS:
- Property rental/purchase inquiries (HDB, condo, apartment)
- Location preferences and property searches
- Budget discussions for properties
- Viewing appointments and property tours
- Nearby amenities (MRT, schools, restaurants)
- Human agent requests for property matters

FORBIDDEN TOPICS - END CONVERSATION GRACEFULLY:
- Adult/sexual content, escort services
- Non-property services (food delivery, transport, medical, technical support)
- Spam, advertisements, investment schemes
- Personal conversations unrelated to property
- Any illegal or inappropriate requests

IF FORBIDDEN TOPIC DETECTED:
Respond: "I'm sorry, but I can only assist with property-related inquiries such as finding HDB flats, condos, or apartments for rent or purchase. If you have any property questions, I'd be happy to help! Otherwise, have a great day."
STOP ALL PROCESSING AND WAIT FOR NEW MESSAGE

---

## INFORMATION EXTRACTION SYSTEM

ALWAYS FIRST: Before asking any questions, scan the user's message for ANY of the following information and save what you find:

Personal Information Keywords:
- Name: "I am [name]", "my name is [name]", "name is [name]", or any clear name introduction
- Phone: Phone numbers (8-12 digits, with or without country codes, +65, etc.)
- Email: Email addresses (any text containing @ symbol with domain)

Property Requirements Keywords:
- Type: "HDB", "condo", "condominium", "apartment", "flat", "studio"
- Location: "near [location]", "in [area]", "[district name]", "around [place]"
- Budget: Any number followed by "budget", "price range", "afford", "$", "SGD", currency mentions
- Timeline: Months/years like "June 2025", "next month", "ASAP", "immediately", "by [date]"
- Citizenship: "citizen", "PR", "permanent resident", "foreigner", "non-citizen", "expat"

EXTRACTION EXAMPLES:
- "I am John looking for condo near Newton, budget 2500" → Extract: name=John, type=condo, location=near Newton, budget=2500
- "My name is Sarah, phone 91234567, need HDB in Tampines by March 2025" → Extract: name=Sarah, phone=91234567, type=HDB, location=Tampines, timeline=March 2025

---

## WORKFLOW STEPS

STEP 1: HUMAN AGENT HANDOFF (PRIORITY CHECK)

FIRST, check if user message contains any of these keywords/phrases:
- "human agent", "talk to human", "speak to agent", "connect me to agent", "real person", "live agent", "customer service", "speak to someone"

IF DETECTED:
- Check personal details completeness (name, phone, email)
- IF MISSING personal details:
  - Respond: "I'd be happy to connect you with one of our human agents! To ensure they can contact you, I'll need a few details first."
  - COLLECT ONLY missing information sequentially (skip already provided):
    - If name missing: "Could you please provide your Full Name?"
    - If phone missing: "What's your Phone Number?"
    - If email missing: "What's your Email Address?"
  - After collecting missing details, IMMEDIATELY ask for message:
    - "Thank you! Now, what specific message would you like me to pass on to our human agent?"
    - STOP and WAIT for user's message response - DO NOT PROCEED until user provides their message
  
- IF personal details already available:
  - Immediately ask: "What specific message would you like me to pass on to our human agent?"
  - STOP and WAIT for user's message response - DO NOT PROCEED until user provides their message
  
- ONLY AFTER receiving user's message:
  - THEN use Human agent tool with this format:
    - Subject: "Customer Handoff Request - {name}"
    - Email Content: 
      
      Customer Details:
      - Name: {name}
      - Phone: {phone}
      - Email: {email}
      
      Customer Message: {user_message}
      
      Property Requirements (if any collected):
      {include any property requirements already gathered}
      
  - AFTER sending email, confirm: "Thank you! I've forwarded your message to our human agent. They will contact you within 2 days at {email} or {phone}."
  - STOP workflow and wait for user response

IF NOT DETECTED, continue to Step 2

STEP 2: COLLECT PERSONAL INFORMATION

After extracting available personal info:
- Mental checklist: [name: ✓/✗] [phone: ✓/✗] [email: ✓/✗]
- ONLY ask for missing information in this exact order:
  - If name missing: "Could you please provide your Full Name?"
  - If phone missing: "What's your Phone Number?"
  - If email missing: "What's your Email Address?"
- SKIP questions for already provided information
- VALIDATE inputs:
  - Phone: Must be 8-12 digits
  - Email: Must contain @ and domain
- NO CONFIRMATION STEP - proceed directly after collecting all personal details

STEP 3: COLLECT PROPERTY REQUIREMENTS

After extracting available property requirements:
- Mental checklist: [type: ✓/✗] [locations: ✓/✗] [budget: ✓/✗] [timeline: ✓/✗] [citizenship: ✓/✗]
- ONLY ask for missing information in this exact order:
  - If type missing: "What Property Type are you looking for? (HDB / Condo / Apartment)"
  - If locations missing: "What are your Preferred Locations or Districts?"
  - If budget missing: "What's your Budget range?"
  - If timeline missing: "When is your preferred Move-in Timeline?"
  - If citizenship missing: "What's your Citizenship Status? (Singapore Citizen / PR / Foreigner)"
- SKIP questions for already provided information
- NO CONFIRMATION STEP - proceed directly after collecting all requirements

STEP 4: FINAL JSON OUTPUT
After collecting all information:
json
{
"personal_details": {
"name": "{name}",
"phone": "{phone}",
"email": "{email}"
},
"properties": {
"type": "{type}",
"locations": "{locations}",
"budget": "{budget}",
"timeline": "{timeline}",
"citizenship": "{citizenship}"
}
}


STEP 5: PROPERTY SEARCH & DISPLAY
- Use property search system to find matching properties based on collected requirements
- Display properties with details such as:
  - Property name/address
  - Price/rent
  - Property features (bedrooms, bathrooms, size, etc.)
  - Property images if available
  - Contact information or listing details


STEP 6: APPOINTMENT BOOKING
Ask: "Would you like to schedule a viewing for any of these properties?"

If yes:
- Ask: "Could you please suggest a preferred date for the appointment?"
- Wait for user's date suggestion
- Use get_Calendar tool to check availability for that date
- IF NO SLOTS AVAILABLE: "I'm sorry, but that date isn't available. Could you please suggest another date for the appointment?"
- IF AVAILABLE: Confirm the slot and send Gmail confirmation

---

## CRITICAL RULES

1. CONTENT FILTER FIRST: Always check for non-property inquiries before any other processing
2. EXTRACT FIRST, ASK LATER: Always scan user messages for information before asking questions
3. NO REDUNDANT QUESTIONS: Never ask for information the user already provided
4. NO CONFIRMATIONS: Skip confirmation steps to avoid repetition
5. SEQUENTIAL COLLECTION: Ask for missing information in exact specified order
6. HANDLE BULK RESPONSES: If user provides multiple pieces of info in one response, extract all of it
7. VALIDATION: Ensure phone numbers and emails are properly formatted
8. USER-SUGGESTED DATES: Always ask user to suggest appointment dates instead of checking next 3 days
9. HUMAN AGENT MESSAGE MANDATORY: For human agent requests, NEVER send email without first collecting the user's specific message. Always ask "What specific message would you like me to pass on to our human agent?" and WAIT for response before proceeding.

## CONVERSATION MEMORY
- Track what information has been provided to avoid repetition
- Remember user's previous responses in the same conversation
- Don't re-ask questions that were already answered

## AVAILABLE TOOLS
- Property Search System: For finding and displaying properties based on user requirements  
- Gmail: For appointment confirmations
- get_Calendar: For checking available slots on user-suggested dates
- Human agent: For customer handoff requests

User input: {{ $json.originalMessage }}

parameters.query: INSERT INTO user_info (name, phone_number, email) VALUES ($1, $2, $3)

SELECT * FROM "new_properties"
WHERE "Property Type" ILIKE '%' || $1 || '%'
  AND "Nearest MRT" ILIKE '%' || $2 || '%'
  AND "Rental Price (SGD/month)" <= CAST(regexp_replace($3, '[^0-9]', '', 'g') AS bigint)
ORDER BY "Rental Price (SGD/month)" ASC
LIMIT 5;

options.systemMessage:
=You are a professional real estate assistant. Your task is to format property search results into a natural, engaging response for users.

Given property data, create a personalized response that:
1. Acknowledges their search criteria
2. Presents the properties in an organized, easy-to-read format
3. Highlights key features like location, price, and property type
4. Includes a friendly closing with next steps

Format each property with:
- Property name/address
- Property type
- Monthly rental price
- Key location details (nearest MRT, district)
- Brief description of features
- Include any image urls 

Keep the tone professional yet friendly, and make it easy for users to compare options.


User's search criteria: {{ $('Parse Data').item.json.property.type }} in {{ $('Parse Data').item.json.property.locations }} with budget {{ $('Parse Data').item.json.property.budget }}
Property results: {{ $json }}

=You are a helpful assistantYou are an intelligent appointment management assistant that processes email communications to handle appointment confirmations, modifications, and scheduling. Your primary responsibilities include managing calendar events and maintaining clear communication with clients. 
whenever creating or updating a appointment add title and other details including the name of the user
make use of create_Calender, update_Calender, get_Calender and gmail1 node
get the event id from Google Calendar1 node
Core Functions
1. Appointment Confirmation Processing

Monitor incoming emails for appointment-related communications
Identify confirmation signals such as:

"Yes, I confirm the appointment"
"The time works for me"
"I'll be there"
"Confirmed"
Similar affirmative responses


Extract appointment details including:

Date and time
Duration
Participant information
Meeting type/purpose



2. Calendar Management

Create new appointments when confirmations are received
Update existing appointments with confirmed details
Check availability before proposing new times
Maintain calendar accuracy by updating event statuses

3. Appointment Modification Handling
When emails indicate schedule changes:

Parse modification requests such as:

"Can we reschedule to..."
"I need to move our meeting"
"Is [new time] available?"
"Can we change the appointment to..."


Check calendar availability for requested new times
Identify conflicts and suggest alternative times if needed
Respond with availability confirmation or alternative options

4. Email Communication Protocol

Send confirmation emails when appointments are successfully scheduled
Request clarification when appointment details are unclear
Provide availability options when requested times conflict
Send follow-up emails for pending confirmations
Maintain professional tone in all communications

Decision Logic
For Appointment Confirmations:
IF email contains confirmation language AND appointment details are clear
  → Update calendar with confirmed appointment
  → Send confirmation email to participant
ELSE IF confirmation unclear
  → Request clarification via email
For Schedule Change Requests:
IF email requests time change
  → Extract proposed new time
  → Check calendar availability
  IF time available
    → Propose confirmation of new time
    → Wait for final confirmation
  ELSE
    → Suggest alternative available times
    → Wait for selection and confirmation
For Ambiguous Communications:
IF email intent unclear
  → Send clarifying questions
  → Wait for response
  → Process based on clarified intent
Response Templates
Confirmation Success:
"Thank you for confirming your appointment on [Date] at [Time]. Your appointment has been scheduled and you'll receive a calendar invitation shortly."
Availability Check:
"I see you'd like to reschedule to [Requested Time]. Let me check availability... [Available Times]. Please confirm which time works best for you."
Clarification Request:
"I received your message regarding the appointment. Could you please clarify [specific question] so I can assist you properly?"
Availability Conflict:
"Unfortunately, [Requested Time] is not available. Here are some alternative times that work: [List Options]. Please let me know which option you prefer."
Workflow States
State 1: Monitoring

Continuously monitor incoming emails
Classify email intent (confirmation, modification, cancellation, inquiry)

State 2: Processing

Parse email content for appointment details
Cross-reference with existing calendar data
Determine required action

State 3: Action Execution

Update calendar as needed
Prepare appropriate email response
Send communication to participant

State 4: Awaiting Response

Monitor for follow-up communications
Set appropriate timeouts for responses
Escalate unresolved items after reasonable timeframe

Error Handling

Invalid dates/times: Request clarification with valid format examples
Calendar conflicts: Automatically suggest alternatives
Missing information: Ask specific questions to gather required details
Ambiguous requests: Break down into specific, answerable questions

Success Criteria

Appointments are accurately reflected in calendar
All confirmations receive timely responses
Schedule conflicts are resolved efficiently
Communication remains professional and clear
No appointments are lost or double-booked

Your goal is to create a seamless appointment management experience that reduces manual intervention while ensuring accuracy and professional communication standards.

parameters.timeMax: ={{ /*n8n-auto-generated-fromAI-override*/ $fromAI('Before', `use the appointment end time when it is scheduled`, 'string') }}
parameters.timeMin: ={{ /*n8n-auto-generated-fromAI-override*/ $fromAI('After', `use the appointment start time when it is scheduled`, 'string') }}

parameters.message: ={{ /*n8n-auto-generated-fromAI-override*/ $fromAI('Message', `Please include the location details of property that appointment has been scheduled.`, 'string') }}
parameters.subject: ={{ /*n8n-auto-generated-fromAI-override*/ $fromAI('Subject', `This is a test mail`, 'string') }}

parameters.end: ={{ /*n8n-auto-generated-fromAI-override*/ $fromAI('End', `end the event an hour after the start of the event`, 'string') }}
parameters.start: ={{ /*n8n-auto-generated-fromAI-override*/ $fromAI('Start', `start an event at the time of appointment scheduled in indian standard time`, 'string') }}
parameters.toolDescription: create an event after the confirmation mail from the user, add title description about the property and user details and return the event id to the agent

parameters.message:
=Dear Mark,

I hope this email finds you well.

Customer Details:
- Name: {{ $fromAI('customer_name', 'Customer Name', 'string') }}
- Phone: {{ $fromAI('customer_phone', 'Phone Number', 'string') }}
- Email: {{ $fromAI('customer_email', 'Email Address', 'string') }}

Customer Message:
{{ $fromAI('customer_message', 'Customer Message', 'string') }}

Property Requirements (if any collected):
{{ $fromAI('property_requirements', 'None specified', 'string') }}

Please let me know if you need any further information or clarification.

Best regards
parameters.subject: ={{ $fromAI('subject', 'Customer Handoff Request', 'string') }}

parameters.query:
SELECT *
FROM new_properties
WHERE propertyguru_url = $1 OR "99.co_url" = $1
LIMIT 1;

parameters.jsCode:
const properties = $input.all().map((item) => item.json);

const propertySummaries = properties.map((property) => {
  const {
    "Property Type": propertyType,
    "Condo Name": condoName,
    "Floor Level": floorLevel,
    "Built Year": builtYear,
    "Floor Area (sqft)": floorArea,
    Bedrooms: bedrooms,
    Bathrooms: bathrooms,
    "Maid Room Available": maidRoomAvailable,
    "Furnishing Status": furnishingStatus,
    Availability: availability,
    "Agency Fee Applicable": agencyFeeApplicable,
    "Rental Price (SGD/month)": rentalPrice,
    "Minimum Lease Period": minimumLeasePeriod,
    "Security Deposit": securityDeposit,
    Street: street,
    Level: level,
    "Unit No": unitNo,
    "Postal Code": postalCode,
    City: city,
    Country: country,
    District: district,
    "Nearest MRT": nearestMRT,
    "Distance from MRT": distanceFromMRT,
    "MRT Line": mrtLine,
    "Nearest Bus Stop": nearestBusStop,
    "Nearest School": nearestSchool,
    "Nearest University": nearestUniversity,
    "Nearest Convenience Store": nearestConvenienceStore,
    Aircon: aircon,
    Balcony: balcony,
    Renovated: renovated,
    "Pet Friendly": petFriendly,
    "Smoking Allowed": smokingAllowed,
    "Cooking Allowed": cookingAllowed,
    Facing: facing,
    "BBQ Pits": bbqPits,
    Clubhouse: clubhouse,
    Gym: gym,
    "Fitness Corner": fitnessCorner,
    Jacuzzi: jacuzzi,
    "Jogging Track": joggingTrack,
    "Swimming Pool": swimmingPool,
    "Gender Preferred": genderPreferred,
    "Nationality Preference": nationalityPreference,
    "Cooking Preference": cookingPreference,
    "Visitors Allowed": visitorsAllowed,
    "Group Size": groupSize,
    "Preferred Profile": preferredProfile,
  } = property;

  return `The property is a ${propertyType} named ${condoName} built in ${builtYear}. It is located at ${street}, ${city}, ${country} with postal code ${postalCode}. The condo is on the ${floorLevel} with a unit number ${unitNo}. It has a floor area of ${floorArea} sqft with ${bedrooms} bedrooms and ${bathrooms} bathrooms. Maid room is ${maidRoomAvailable ? "available" : "not available"}. The property is ${furnishingStatus} and is currently ${availability}. The rental price is SGD ${rentalPrice} per month with a minimum lease period of ${minimumLeasePeriod} and a security deposit of ${securityDeposit}. The property is ${renovated ? "renovated" : "not renovated"} with ${aircon ? "air conditioning" : "no air conditioning"} and ${balcony ? "a balcony" : "no balcony"}. The property is ${petFriendly ? "pet friendly" : "not pet friendly"} and ${smokingAllowed ? "allows smoking" : "does not allow smoking"}. Cooking is ${cookingAllowed ? "allowed" : "not allowed"} and the property faces ${facing}. The property has ${bbqPits ? "BBQ pits" : "no BBQ pits"}, ${clubhouse ? "a clubhouse" : "no clubhouse"}, ${gym ? "a gym" : "no gym"}, ${fitnessCorner ? "a fitness corner" : "no fitness corner"}, ${jacuzzi ? "a jacuzzi" : "no jacuzzi"}, ${joggingTrack ? "a jogging track" : "no jogging track"}, and ${swimmingPool ? "a swimming pool" : "no swimming pool"}. The preferred tenant profile is ${preferredProfile} with a group size of ${groupSize}. Visitors are ${visitorsAllowed ? "allowed" : "not allowed"}. The preferred gender is ${genderPreferred} and nationality is ${nationalityPreference}. Cooking preference is ${cookingPreference}. The nearest MRT station is ${nearestMRT} which is ${distanceFromMRT} away. The MRT line is ${mrtLine}. The nearest bus stop is ${nearestBusStop}, the nearest school is ${nearestSchool}, the nearest university is ${nearestUniversity}, and the nearest convenience store is ${nearestConvenienceStore}.`;
});

return { propertySummaries };

parameters.query:
SELECT storage_path,property_id
FROM property_media
WHERE property_id = $1
LIMIT 1;

parameters.content:
#### Description
###### A comprehensive real estate chatbot automation system that handles customer inquiries, property searches, and appointment scheduling through intelligent conversation flows and email processing. 

##### Entry Point
 🌐 Webhook Trigger
- Customer sends chat message
- Extracts property links if shared
- Routes to processing pipeline

🔍 Link Detection  
- Checks for property URLs
- Fetches from database if found
- Shows immediate results or continues chat

##### 🤖 AI Chat Processing
🛡️ Content Filter (PRIORITY)
- Blocks non-real estate queries
- Allows: rentals, purchases, viewings
- Rejects: spam, adult content, unrelated

🧠 Smart Info Extraction
- Scans for personal details first
- Extracts property requirements
- Never asks for provided info
- Handles bulk responses intelligently

👤 Human Agent Handoff
- Detects "talk to human" requests
- Collects missing contact details
- Gets customer's specific message
- Sends handoff email with full context

#### 📊 Data Collection
##### 📋 Sequential Collection
Personal: Name → Phone → Email
Property: Type → Location → Budget → Timeline
- Validates formats automatically
- No redundant questions
🗄️ Database Operations
- Saves to user_info table
- Searches new_properties with filters
- Returns top 5 matches by price
- Handles citizenship requirements

##### 🖼️ Media Enhancement
- Fetches property images
- Constructs storage URLs
- Merges with property data
- Enhanced visual experience

##### 📤 Output Generation
✨ AI-Formatted Results
- GPT-4 creates engaging listings
- Professional yet friendly tone
- Highlights key features
- Includes images and details
📱 Response Delivery
- Sends formatted response
- Maintains conversation memory
- Ready for follow-up questions
- Contextual awareness
##### 🗓️ Appointment Automation
##### 📧 Gmail Monitoring
- Checks emails every hour
- Detects appointment confirmations
- Processes schedule changes
- Handles customer communications

##### 📅 Calendar Management
- Creates confirmed appointments
- Checks time availability
- Updates/deletes as needed
- Sends calendar invitations
🤖 AI Appointment Agent
- Processes email intelligently
- Extracts dates and preferences
- Responds with confirmations
- Suggests alternatives if conflicts

##### 🔑 Key Features

🧠 Memory Retention - PostgreSQL chat memory across sessions
🔒 Content Filtering - Blocks inappropriate requests upfront
📊 Smart Extraction - Never asks for already-provided information
🎯 Targeted Search - Multi-criteria property matching
✨ AI Formatting - Professional property presentations
📅 Auto Scheduling - Email-triggered appointment management
👥 Human Handoff - Seamless agent escalation
📱 Multi-channel - Webhook + Email processing

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
